edu.biu.protocols.yao.offlineOnline.specs

Class OfflineProtocolP2

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.protocols.yao.offlineOnline.specs.OfflineProtocolP2

  • public class OfflineProtocolP2
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the second party in the offline phase of Malicious Yao protocol.

    The full protocol specification is described in "Blazing Fast 2PC in the "Offline/Online Setting with Security for Malicious Adversaries" paper by Yehuda Lindell and Ben Riva, page 18 - section E, "The Full Protocol Specification".

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Asaf Cohen)

      BucketList<LimitedBundle> getCheatingRecoveryBuckets()
      Returns the list of cheating recovery circuit's buckets.

      Returns the probe resistant matrix related to the cheating recovery circuit.

      Returns the list of main circuit's buckets.
      KProbeResistantMatrix getMainProbeResistantMatrix()

        mainExecution - Parameters of the main circuit.
